43 enum StoichType {
44  STOICH_11,
45  STOICH_21,
46  STOICH_22,
47  STOICH_31,
48  STOICH_32,
49  STOICH_33

51 
56 class JacStoichBase
57 {
58 public:
59  virtual ~JacStoichBase() {};
60 };
61 
65 class JacStoich11 : public JacStoichBase
66 {
67 public:
68 
69  JacStoich11(const size_t sp)
70  : m_sp(sp)
71  { }
72 
73  static int nSpecies() {
74  return 1;
75  }
76 
77  int operator () (const int& index) const {
78  return m_sp;
79  }
80 
81  double operator [] (const int& index) const {
82  return 1.0;
83  }
84 
85  inline double rr(double k, const double* const conc) const {
86  return k * conc[m_sp];
87  }
88 
89  template <typename Op>
90  inline void diffRR(
91  const double& k, const double* const conc, double* const drr,
92  const Op& op) const
93  {
94  op(drr[m_sp], k);
95  }
96 
97 private:
98 
99  size_t m_sp;
100 
101 };
102 
106 class JacStoich21 : public JacStoichBase
107 {
108 public:
109 
110  JacStoich21(const size_t sp)
111  : m_sp(sp)
112  { }
113 
114  static int nSpecies() {
115  return 1;
116  }
117 
118  int operator () (const int& index) const {
119  return m_sp;
120  }
121 
122  double operator [] (const int& index) const {
123  return 2.0;
124  }
125 
126  inline double rr(double k, const double* const conc) const {
127  return k * conc[m_sp] * conc[m_sp];
128  }
129 
130  template <typename Op>
131  inline void diffRR(
132  const double& k, const double* const conc, double* const drr,
133  const Op& op) const
134  {
135  op(drr[m_sp], 2.0 * k * conc[m_sp]);
136  }
137 
138 private:
139 
140  size_t m_sp;
141 
142 };
143 
147 class JacStoich22 : public JacStoichBase
148 {
149 public:
150 
151  JacStoich22(const size_t sp1, const size_t sp2)
152  : m_sp1(sp1), m_sp2(sp2)
153  { }
154 
155  static int nSpecies() {
156  return 2;
157  }
158 
159  int operator () (const int& index) const {
160  return (index == 0 ? m_sp1 : m_sp2);
161  }
162 
163  double operator [] (const int& index) const {
164  return 1.0;
165  }
166 
167  inline double rr(double k, const double* const conc) const {
168  return k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp2];
169  }
170 
171  template <typename Op>
172  inline void diffRR(
173  const double k, const double* const conc, double* const drr,
174  const Op& op) const
175  {
176  op(drr[m_sp1], k * conc[m_sp2]);
177  op(drr[m_sp2], k * conc[m_sp1]);
178  }
179 
180 private:
181 
182  size_t m_sp1;
183  size_t m_sp2;
184 
185 };
186 
190 class JacStoich31 : public JacStoichBase
191 {
192 public:
193 
194  JacStoich31(const size_t sp)
195  : m_sp(sp)
196  { }
197 
198  static int nSpecies() {
199  return 1;
200  }
201 
202  int operator () (const int& index) const {
203  return m_sp;
204  }
205 
206  double operator [] (const int& index) const {
207  return 3.0;
208  }
209 
210  inline double rr(double k, const double* const conc) const {
211  return k * conc[m_sp] * conc[m_sp] * conc[m_sp];
212  }
213 
214  template <typename Op>
215  inline void diffRR(
216  const double k, const double* const conc, double* const drr,
217  const Op& op) const
218  {
219  op(drr[m_sp], 3.0 * k * conc[m_sp] * conc[m_sp]);
220  }
221 private:
222 
223  size_t m_sp;
224 
225 };
226 
230 class JacStoich32 : public JacStoichBase
231 {
232 public:
233 
234  JacStoich32(const size_t sp1, const size_t sp2)
235  : m_sp1(sp1), m_sp2(sp2)
236  { }
237 
238  static int nSpecies() {
239  return 2;
240  }
241 
242  int operator () (const int& index) const {
243  return (index == 0 ? m_sp1 : m_sp2);
244  }
245 
246  double operator [] (const int& index) const {
247  return (index == 0 ? 2.0 : 1.0);
248  }
249 
250  inline double rr(double k, const double* const conc) const {
251  return k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp2];
252  }
253 
254  template <typename Op>
255  inline void diffRR(
256  const double k, const double* const conc, double* const drr,
257  const Op& op) const
258  {
259  op(drr[m_sp1], 2.0 * k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp2]);
260  op(drr[m_sp2], k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp1]);
261  }
262 
263 private:
264 
265  size_t m_sp1;
266  size_t m_sp2;
267 
268 };
269 
273 class JacStoich33 : public JacStoichBase
274 {
275 public:
276 
277  JacStoich33(const size_t sp1, const size_t sp2, const size_t sp3)
278  : m_sp1(sp1), m_sp2(sp2), m_sp3(sp3)
279  { }
280 
281  static int nSpecies() {
282  return 3;
283  }
284 
285  int operator () (const int& index) const {
286  return (index == 0 ? m_sp1 : (index == 1 ? m_sp2 : m_sp3));
287  }
288 
289  double operator [] (const int& index) const {
290  return 1.0;
291  }
292 
293  inline double rr(double k, const double* const conc) const {
294  return k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp2] * conc[m_sp3];
295  }
296 
297  template <typename Op>
298  inline void diffRR(
299  const double k, const double* const conc, double* const drr,
300  const Op& op) const
301  {
302  op(drr[m_sp1], k * conc[m_sp2] * conc[m_sp3]);
303  op(drr[m_sp2], k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp3]);
304  op(drr[m_sp3], k * conc[m_sp1] * conc[m_sp2]);
305  }
306 
307 private:
308 
309  size_t m_sp1;
310  size_t m_sp2;
311  size_t m_sp3;
312 
313 };
314 
315 
320 class ReactionStoichBase
321 {
322 public:
323 
327  virtual ~ReactionStoichBase() { }
328 
329  virtual void contributeToJacobian(
330  const double kf, const double kb, const double* const conc,
331  double* const work, double* const sjac, const size_t ns) const = 0;
332 };
333 
338 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
339 class ReactionStoich : public ReactionStoichBase
340 {
341 public:
342 
346  ReactionStoich(JacStoichBase* reacs, JacStoichBase* prods)
347  : m_reacs(*static_cast<Reactants*>(reacs)),
348  m_prods(*static_cast<Products*>(prods))
349  {
350  // Save indices and reaction stoichiometry of the involved species
351  for (int i = 0; i < Reactants::nSpecies(); ++i)
352  m_index_stoich.emplace_back(m_reacs(i), -m_reacs[i]);
353 
354  for (int i = 0; i < Products::nSpecies(); ++i) {
355  int k = -1;
356  for (int j = 0; j < Reactants::nSpecies(); ++j)
357  if (m_index_stoich[j].first == m_prods(i)) k = j;
358 
359  if (k == -1)
360  m_index_stoich.emplace_back(m_prods(i), m_prods[i]);
361  else
362  m_index_stoich[k].second += m_prods[i];
363  }
364  }
365 
369  virtual ~ReactionStoich() { }
370 
378  void contributeToJacobian(
379  const double kf, const double kb, const double* const conc,
380  double* const work, double* const sjac, const size_t ns) const;
381 
382 protected:
383 
384  Reactants m_reacs;
385  Products m_prods;
386  std::vector< std::pair<int, int> > m_index_stoich;
387 };
388 
389 
390 // Forward declaration of class ThirdbodyReactionStoich for swap.
391 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
392 class ThirdbodyReactionStoich;
393 
397 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
398 void swap(
399  ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>& left,
400  ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>& right);
401 
402 
408 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
409 class ThirdbodyReactionStoich : public ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>
410 {
411 public:
412 
413  using ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>::m_reacs;
414  using ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>::m_prods;
415  using ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>::m_index_stoich;
416 
420  ThirdbodyReactionStoich(
421  JacStoichBase* reacs, JacStoichBase* prods, const double* const alpha,
422  const size_t ns)
423  : ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>(reacs, prods), m_ns(ns),
424  mp_alpha(new double [ns])
425  {
426  std::copy(alpha, alpha+ns, mp_alpha);
427  }
428 
432  ThirdbodyReactionStoich(const ThirdbodyReactionStoich& to_copy)
433  : ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>(m_reacs, m_prods),
434  m_ns(to_copy.m_ns),
435  mp_alpha(new double [to_copy.m_ns])
436  {
437  std::copy(to_copy.mp_alpha, to_copy.mp_alpha+m_ns, mp_alpha);
438  }
439 
443  ThirdbodyReactionStoich& operator = (ThirdbodyReactionStoich to_copy) {
444  swap(*this, to_copy);
445  return *this;
446  }
447 
451  ~ThirdbodyReactionStoich() {
452  delete [] mp_alpha;
453  mp_alpha = NULL;
454  }
455 
463  void contributeToJacobian(
464  const double kf, const double kb, const double* const conc,
465  double* const work, double* const sjac, const size_t ns) const;
466 
467  friend void swap<Reactants, Products>(
468  ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>&,
469  ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>&);
470 
471 private:
472 
473  size_t m_ns;
474  double* mp_alpha;
475 
476 };
477 
478 
483 class JacobianManager
484 {
485 public:
486 
490  JacobianManager(const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo)
491  : m_thermo(thermo)
492  {
493  mp_work = new double [m_thermo.nSpecies()];
494  }
495 
499  ~JacobianManager()
500  {
501  delete [] mp_work;
502 
503  std::vector<ReactionStoichBase*>::iterator iter = m_reactions.begin();
504  for ( ; iter != m_reactions.end(); ++iter)
505  delete *iter;
506  }
507 
512  void addReaction(const Reaction& reaction);
513 
517  void computeJacobian(
518  const double* const kf, const double* const kb,
519  const double* const conc, double* const sjac) const;
520 
521 private:
522 
528  template <typename Reactants>
529  void addReactionStoich(
530  JacStoichBase* p_reacs, JacStoichBase* p_prods, const StoichType type,
531  const Reaction& reaction);
532 
539  bool getJacStoich(
540  const std::vector<int>& stoich_set, JacStoichBase** p_stoich,
541  StoichType& type) const;
542 
543 private:
544 
545  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& m_thermo;
546  double* mp_work;
547  std::vector<ReactionStoichBase*> m_reactions;
548 
549 };
